headline: 3 Reasons to Sell HAS and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Hasbro’s stock price fell to $60.89. Shareholders have lost 15.4% of their capital, disappointing when considering the S&P 500 was flat. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
